Text: @peerGeek: I downloaded http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6904094/Dirty_Sign_Language_English__Spanish__French__Russian___Portugue and it has the same flaw, so the source material is probably flawed as well.  Actually not all L's are missing.  Italic and capital L's are visible.  The good part is that most Spanish texts are written in Italic, so you don't have to guess in a foreign language.  Still quite annoying though.
